title: [BUG] Error building Blazor WASM project with SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor in Docker Container
body:
**Description**
When trying to build a Blazor WASM Aspnet Hosted Project in a Docker Container I get an build error.

**Code**

[Repository with solution to reproduce the issue](https://github.com/ordazl/BlazorSkiaSharp)

**Expected Behavior**

To build correctly without an error like on Windows Desktop.

**Actual Behavior**

Builds with the following error:
`C:\Program Files\dotnet\packs\Microsoft.NET.Runtime.WebAssembly.Sdk\7.0.2\Sdk\WasmApp.Native.targets(285,5): error MSB3073: The command ""C:\Program Files\dotnet\packs\Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.AOT.win-x64.Cross.browser-wasm\7.0.2\Sdk\..\tools\mono-aot-cross.exe" --print-icall-table > "C:\src\BlazorSkiaSharp\Client\obj\Debug\net7.0\wasm\for-build\runtime-icall-table.h"" exited with code -1073741511. [C:\src\BlazorSkiaSharp\Client\BlazorSkiaSharp.Client.csproj]`

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor version 2.88.3
- Last known good version:  unknown
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2022 Version 17.4.4
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - WASM
- Target Devices: 
  - Browser

**Reproduction Link**

[Repository with solution to reproduce the issue](https://github.com/ordazl/BlazorSkiaSharp)
